name: The Dave Experience
description:
This is a game inspired by Microsoft Bob made in 4 days duration. It features a sarcastic desktop assistant Dave. Use mouse to click around objects :p

A lots of the parts are still under development. Currently, I only made the printer, email and the exit button, there will be some other elements added in the future as well as more plots.  

Please leave me any comments and feedback on how to improve! 

Thanks a lot and I hope you enjoy the game :)
